item.title: Organizing Topics with Maps
item.description: The first DITA map organizes topics 1,2, and 3 into a web (HTML) deliverable. A second map organizes topics 1, 3, and 5 into a print (PDF) deliverable. A third map organizes all six topics into a Help deliverable. DITA provides reuse of topic content with single sourcing. Change the original topic content, recompile and all your delivarabhos are updated
